name: Product or business process innovating companies, by firm classification of sex of owners: 2019–21
description: Product or business process innovating companies, by firm classification of sex of owners: 2019–21

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_product_or_business_process_innovation_number_yes
variableMeasured.description: Product Or Business Process Innovation Number Yes

variableMeasured.name: field_product_or_business_process_innovation_number_no
variableMeasured.description: Product Or Business Process Innovation Number No

variableMeasured.name: field_product_or_business_process_innovation_percent_yes
variableMeasured.description: Product Or Business Process Innovation Percent Yes

variableMeasured.name: field_product_or_business_process_innovation_percent_no
variableMeasured.description: Product Or Business Process Innovation Percent No

notes: Detail across rows may not add to total because of rounding. Detail across columns have been adjusted to add to total. Unclassifiable category includes firms that have no owners with a 10% or greater ownership of the stock or equity in the business. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States. Companies are classified according to owner demographics if persons with that demographic characteristic own more than a 50% stake in the company.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, 2022 Annual Business Survey: Data Year 2021.
